title: Daft dog tries (and fails) to carry a giant stick through an open door
text:
A daft dog was caught trying to get a large stick through an open door horizontally with his mouth.

Thai Bangkaew dog Zero was filmed by his owner trying to get his new toy inside in Nonthaburi, Thailand, but was thwarted in his attempt.

In the clip, captured last month, Zero holds the long, wooden stick in his mouth as he stands by the door.

The clip, taken in Nonthaburi, Thailand, shows Thai Bangkaew dog Zero trying to get his new toy inside. Zero holds the long, wooden stick in his mouth before ramming it into the door frame

He backs up before heading straight into the gap, ramming the stick into the door frame.

He pauses for a while, trying to force the stick through, before realising that it is just too long.

The defeated pooch quickly gives up and dejectedly drops his toy on the floor before bounding inside by himself.

He pauses for a while, trying to force the stick through, before realising that it is just too long. The defeated pooch quickly gives up and dejectedly drops his toy on the floor before bounding inside by himself

Owner Ton Saeguay can be heard laughing at his dog's antics.

Mr Saeguay said: 'Zero collected the stick from outside. He totally enjoyed playing with it and wanted it home with him.

'I wanted to help him but it was also funny to keep watching him getting stuck by the door without realising that the thing in his mouth was the problem.'
description: The Thai Bangkaew dog called Zero was filmed by his owner in Nonthaburi, Thailand. In the clip, taken by owner Ton Saeguay, he desperately tries to get his new toy inside but is thwarted in his attempt.
